description:
This is a 28 day detoxification transformation. Whether you are looking for specific detoxification information or want a day-to-day guide, this course if for you. It is jam packed with information and teaches you all about detoxification. Tells you not only what you can do to help cleanse your mind and body, but also why you should incorporate a comprehensive detoxification into your life. It starts with education about cleansing and then goes into a 28 day program. It is the most holistic program out there with supplement, dietary, and physical activity information. It also gives daily activities to make this not about just the 28 days, but also to help propel you into a new healthier you.

*** This is not a medical detoxification program and you are not under medical care. If you have health concerns or specific medical questions about yourself than you should be under the care of a medical provider.
title: 28-Day Detoxification Transformation
